articles.author: Sam Blewett
articles.title: Chinese officials bundle British journalists out of Starmer-Xi meeting - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Move came as UK prime minister — who is pitching a visit to Beijing — raised the case of pro-democracy publisher Jimmy Lai.
articles.content:
Those talks will be particularly interesting as Donald Trump returns to the White House threatening to hit China with punitive tariffs under his America First policy. 
I'm keen that my chancellor sh… [+1435 chars]
